<voice 00839_00004068><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>This is the 3rd time that she's targeted Junk Castle,

<voice 02508_00004091><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>達斯頓大人非常非常
熱衷於蒐集廢品！！
而幫助他就是我們的工作！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4092.en:
<voice 02528_00004092><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>...That said, if you have a Proof of Adulthood—which
is just as useless as Lord Duston's Key Emblem—you
already knew that, didn't you!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4092.ja:
<voice 02528_00004092><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「……って　ダストンさまのキーエンブレムと
　同じくらい役に立たない　一人前の証を
　持っていらっしゃるなら　おわかりですね！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4092.ko:
<voice 02528_00004092><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: ……뭐, 더스턴 님의 키 엠블럼
　못지않게 쓸모없는 모험가의 증표를
　갖고 계시니 말 안 해도 아시겠지만요!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4092.zh-Hans:
<voice 02528_00004092><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>……你既然带着和达斯顿大人的键徽一样
没用的合格者的证明，
我想你心里应该很清楚！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4092.zh-Hant:
<voice 02528_00004092><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>……你既然帶著和達斯頓大人的鑰徽一樣
沒用的合格者之證，
我想你心裡應該很清楚！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000573.en:
<voice 02572_19000573><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Whaddya doin', Junkey #2! Ya're still hangin' 'round
here!?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000573.ja:
<voice 02572_19000573><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「何してんです！　ポツコン２号！
　まだ　こんな所にいたんですかッ！？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000573.ko:
<voice 02572_19000573><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 뭐 하는 거죠, 터리엉 2호?
　아직도 여기 있었습니까!?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000573.zh-Hans:
<voice 02572_19000573><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你在干什么，波茨康２号！
你怎么还在这里啊？！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000573.zh-Hant:
<voice 02572_19000573><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你在做什麼！波茨康２號！
怎麼還在這裡啊！？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4094.en:
<voice 02620_00004094><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Ya've got a pretty useless style, ain'tcha! C'mon,
let's get outta town, 'n' head northeast! We're goin'
after Poiclin!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4094.ja:
<voice 02620_00004094><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「なかなか　いい役立たずっぷりですね！
　さあ　町を飛びだし　北東へ出発ですよ！
　ポイックリンを追うんですッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4094.ko:
<voice 02620_00004094><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 정말이지 아주 쓸모가 없네요!
　자, 마을 밖으로 나가 북동쪽으로 갑시다!
　져클린을 쫓아야 해요!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4094.zh-Hans:
<voice 02620_00004094><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你那副没用的样子真是太棒了！
快点离开城镇，往东北方出发！
去追上珀伊库琳吧！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4094.zh-Hant:
<voice 02620_00004094><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你那副沒用的樣子真是太棒了！
快點離開市鎮，往東北方出發！
去追上珀伊庫琳吧！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000574.en: Duston and Junkie #1 have, forcibly, joined the party!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000574.ja:
ダストンと　ポツコン１号が
むりやり　パーティに加わった。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000574.ko:
더스턴과 터리엉 1호가
억지로 파티에 합류했다.<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000574.zh-Hans:
达斯顿与波茨康１号
硬是加入了队伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000574.zh-Hant:
達斯頓與波茨康１號
硬是加入了隊伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

4095.ja: <voice 00130_00004095><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「あっ　ポツコン２号さん！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4095.ko: <voice 00130_00004095><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 앗, 터리엉 2호님!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4095.zh-Hans: <voice 00130_00004095><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>啊！波茨康２号！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4095.zh-Hant: <voice 00130_00004095><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>啊！波茨康２號！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000575.en:
<voice 00310_19000575><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Why did you come back? Losing sight of what you're
supposed to be doing right away, you're just as useless
as I thought you would be!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000575.ja:
<voice 00310_19000575><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「なんで　戻ってくるんです？
　さっそく　やるべきことを見失うなんて
　さすがの　役立たずっぷりですね！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000575.ko:
<voice 00310_19000575><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 왜 돌아왔어요?
　벌써 해야 할 일을 놓치다니
　역시 쓸모없는 정도가 남다르군요!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000575.zh-Hans:
<voice 00310_19000575><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>为什么回来了？
立刻就忘了该做的事，
还真是没用啊！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000575.zh-Hant:
<voice 00310_19000575><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>為什麼回來了？
立刻就忘了該做的事，
還真是沒用耶！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000576.en:
<voice 00360_19000576><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Junkey #2, you have to track down Phantom Thief
Poiclin, who fled Gatara to the northeast!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000576.ja:
<voice 00360_19000576><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ポツコン２号さん
　ガタラを飛びだし　北東へ逃げた
　怪盗ポイックリンを追いましょう！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000576.ko:
<voice 00360_19000576><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 터리엉 2호님
　가타라를 벗어나 북동쪽으로 도망친
　괴도 져클린을 쫓아가죠!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000576.zh-Hans:
<voice 00360_19000576><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>波茨康２号，
怪盗珀伊库琳逃出了加塔拉，朝东北方向去了！
快追过去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000576.zh-Hant:
<voice 00360_19000576><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>波茨康２號，
怪盜珀伊庫琳逃出了加塔拉，朝東北方去了，
我們快追上去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4099.en:
<voice 00400_00004099><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>At any rate... It's kind of hard calling you Junkey #2
all the time. Eheheheh.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4099.ja:
<voice 00400_00004099><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「それにしても……　ポツコン２号さんって
　ちょっと呼びにくいですね。
　えへへへへ。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4099.ko:
<voice 00400_00004099><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 그런데…… 터리엉 2호님은
　조금 부르기가 어렵네요.
　에헤헤헤헤.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4099.zh-Hans:
<voice 00400_00004099><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>话又说回来……波茨康２号
这个名字还挺拗口的呢。
耶嘿嘿嘿嘿。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4099.zh-Hant:
<voice 00400_00004099><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>話又說回來……波茨康２號
這個名字還挺拗口的呢。
耶嘿嘿嘿嘿。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4100.en: <voice 00470_00004100><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Kukuku... Finally found ya, Phantom Thief Poiclin!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4100.ja:
<voice 00470_00004100><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「くくく……　とうとう見つけたですよ！
　怪盗ポイックリンめ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4100.ko:
<voice 00470_00004100><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 큭큭큭…… 드디어 찾았군요!
　괴도 져클린!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4100.zh-Hans:
<voice 00470_00004100><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……终于找到你了！
可恶的怪盗珀伊库琳！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4100.zh-Hant:
<voice 00470_00004100><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……終於找到妳了！
可惡的怪盜珀伊庫琳！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4101.en:
<voice 00570_00004101><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Chaldea Cave's like my own personal dumpster! I know
this place like the back o' my hand!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4101.ja:
<voice 00570_00004101><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「カルデア洞穴なら　わしのゴミ箱のようなもの！
　何が　どこに　どうなっているか
　わしには　ぜーんぶ　わかっていますよ。<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4101.ko:
<voice 00570_00004101><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 칼데아 동굴은 제 쓰레기통 같은 곳입니다!
　어디에 뭐가 있는지 전부 훤히 꿰고 있죠.<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4101.zh-Hans:
<voice 00570_00004101><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>卡尔迪亚洞穴就像我的垃圾桶一样！
整个洞穴的构造
我全都了如指掌。<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4101.zh-Hant:
<voice 00570_00004101><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>卡爾迪亞洞穴就像我的垃圾桶一樣！
整個洞穴的構造我全都瞭若指掌。<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4102.en: <voice 00600_00004102><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>I'll beat you to the punch!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4102.ja: <voice 00600_00004102><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「先回りして　ギャフンと言わせてやるです！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4102.ko: <voice 00600_00004102><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 앞질러 가서 한 방 먹여 주죠!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4102.zh-Hans: <voice 00600_00004102><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我要绕到她前面，让她跌破眼镜！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4102.zh-Hant: <voice 00600_00004102><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我要繞到她前面，讓她跌破眼鏡！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4104.en: <voice 00044_00004104><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>I never thought I'd find this...<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4104.ja: <voice 00044_00004104><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「まさか　これを見つけてしまうなんて……。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4104.ko: <voice 00044_00004104><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 설마 이걸 찾아낼 줄이야…….<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4104.zh-Hans: <voice 00044_00004104><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>没想到居然会找到这个……<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4104.zh-Hant: <voice 00044_00004104><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>沒想到居然會找到這個……<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4105.en: <voice 00250_00004105><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>I feel sorry for him, but this is the only way.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4105.ja: <voice 00250_00004105><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「あの人には悪いけど　こうするしかないわ。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4105.ko: <voice 00250_00004105><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 그 사람에겐 미안하지만 이 방법밖에 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4105.zh-Hans: <voice 00250_00004105><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>对那个人有点不好意思，但也别无选择了。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4105.zh-Hant: <voice 00250_00004105><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>對那個人有點不好意思，但也別無選擇了。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4106.en:
<voice 00460_00004106><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>He may have kicked me out, but he's still... Important
to me.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4106.ja:
<voice 00460_00004106><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「私を追いだした人だけど……
　大切な人だから。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4106.ko:
<voice 00460_00004106><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 날 쫓아내긴 했어도……
　소중한 사람이니까.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4106.zh-Hans:
<voice 00460_00004106><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>虽然他把我赶了出去……
但对我来说还是很重要的人。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4106.zh-Hant:
<voice 00460_00004106><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>雖然他把我趕了出去……
但對我來說還是很重要的人。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4107.ja: <voice 00653_00004107><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「あら　あなたは……？<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4107.ko: <voice 00653_00004107><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 어라, 넌……?<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4107.zh-Hans: <voice 00653_00004107><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>哎呀，你是……？<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4107.zh-Hant: <voice 00653_00004107><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>哎呀，你是……？<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4108.en:
<voice 00740_00004108><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>...So, you're <pc>, right. I thought I'd
seen your face somewhere—before, in front of Junk
Castle—you're that person, aren't you.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4108.ja:
<voice 00740_00004108><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「……そう。<pc>っていうのね。
　どこかで見た顔だと思ったら
　あのとき　ガラクタ城の前にいた人じゃない。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4108.ko:
<voice 00740_00004108><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: ……그래, {pc}|hpp(이라,라)고 하는구나.
　어디서 본 것 같다 했더니
　고물성 앞에 있던 사람이잖아.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4108.zh-Hans:
<voice 00740_00004108><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>……这样啊，你叫<pc>。
总觉得有点面熟，
原来是那个时候在废品城前面的人。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4108.zh-Hant:
<voice 00740_00004108><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>……這樣啊，你叫做<pc>。
總覺得有點面熟，
原來是那個時候在廢品城前面的人。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

37915.en: <voice 00876_00037915><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>Gotcha... He asked you to come after me, didn't he?<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
37915.ja:
<voice 00876_00037915><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「そっか……。
　あの人に頼まれて　私のことを追ってきたのね？<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
37915.ko:
<voice 00876_00037915><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 그래…….
　그 사람의 부탁으로 날 쫓아온 거구나?<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
37915.zh-Hans:
<voice 00876_00037915><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>我知道了……
是那个人拜托你来追踪我的吧？<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
37915.zh-Hant:
<voice 00876_00037915><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>我知道了……
是那個人拜託你來追蹤我的吧？<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4109.en:
<voice 00950_00004109><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>Sorry, but I had to throw the Green Tablet into the
magma... So that no one can ever get their hands on it
again!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4109.ja:
<voice 00950_00004109><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「残念だけど　緑の石板は
　マグマの中に捨てちゃったわ。
　もう二度と　誰も　手にできないように！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4109.ko:
<voice 00950_00004109><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 미안하지만 녹색 석판은
　이미 마그마 속에 던져 버렸어.
　다시는 아무도 손에 넣을 수 없게!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4109.zh-Hans:
<voice 00950_00004109><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>很遗憾，绿色石板
我已经丢到岩浆里了。
因为我不希望它落入任何人手中！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4109.zh-Hant:
<voice 00950_00004109><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>很遺憾，綠石板
我已經丟到岩漿裡了。
因為我不希望它落入任何人手中！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4110.en:
<voice 01167_00004110><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>That tablet... Was a key to open a door at the back of
the Urbea Underground Ruins.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4110.ja:
<voice 01167_00004110><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「あの石板はね……
　ウルベア地下遺跡の奥にある
　扉を開けるための　カギだったの。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4110.ko:
<voice 01167_00004110><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 그 석판은……
　우르베아 지하 유적 안에 있는
　문을 여는 열쇠거든.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4110.zh-Hans:
<voice 01167_00004110><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>那块石板是钥匙……
能打开乌尔贝阿地下遗迹
深处的大门。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4110.zh-Hant:
<voice 01167_00004110><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>那塊石板是鑰匙……
能打開烏爾貝亞地下遺跡
深處的大門。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4111.en:
<voice 01355_00004111><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>If he had that tablet, he would eventually open that
door. I can't let that happen!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4111.ja:
<voice 01355_00004111><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「そんな石板が　手元にあれば
　いつか　あの人は扉を開けてしまう。
　それだけは　させるわけにはいかないから！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4111.ko:
<voice 01355_00004111><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 그런 석판을 갖고 있다간
　언젠가 그 사람이 문을 열고 말 거야.
　그렇게 놔둘 순 없어!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4111.zh-Hans:
<voice 01355_00004111><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>那块石板要是在他手中的话，
他早晚会去打开那扇门。
我无论如何都不能让他那么做！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4111.zh-Hant:
<voice 01355_00004111><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>那塊石板要是在他手中的話，
他早晚會去打開那扇門。
我無論如何都不能讓他那麼做！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24736.en: <voice 01448_00024736><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>See ya, <pc>. Give my regards to that dunce!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24736.ja:
<voice 01448_00024736><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「じゃあね　<pc>。
　あの　わからず屋にも　よろしく伝えておいて！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24736.ko:
<voice 01448_00024736><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 그럼 안녕, <pc>.
　그 고집불통한테도 그렇게 전해 줘!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24736.zh-Hans:
<voice 01448_00024736><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>再见，<pc>，
帮我向那个不明事理的人问好！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24736.zh-Hant:
<voice 01448_00024736><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>再見啦，<pc>，
幫我向那個不明事理的人問好！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4112.ja: <voice 01983_00004112><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「くぷぷぷぷ……！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4112.zh-Hans: <voice 01983_00004112><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>唔呼呼呼呼……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4112.zh-Hant: <voice 01983_00004112><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>唔呼呼呼呼……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4113.en: <voice 02240_00004113><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Tricked her, didn't I!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4113.ja: <voice 02240_00004113><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「してやったりですよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4113.ko: <voice 02240_00004113><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 감쪽같이 속였군요!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4113.zh-Hans: <voice 02240_00004113><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>这下是我赢了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4113.zh-Hant: <voice 02240_00004113><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>這下是我贏了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4114.en:
<voice 02348_00004114><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>That Poiclin never expected that I'd be stuck ta the
wall, did she!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4114.ja:
<voice 02348_00004114><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「ポイックリンのヤツも
　まさか　わしが　カベに張りついているとは
　思わなかったようですねえッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4114.ko:
<voice 02348_00004114><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 그 잘난 져클린도
　설마 제가 벽에 붙어 있으리라고는
　상상도 못 한 눈치더군요!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4114.zh-Hans:
<voice 02348_00004114><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>珀伊库琳那家伙，
似乎完全没料到
我会整个人贴在墙壁上！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4114.zh-Hant:
<voice 02348_00004114><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>珀伊庫琳那傢伙，
似乎完全沒料到
我會整個人貼在牆壁上！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4115.en: <voice 02474_00004115><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>What is it, Junkey #2? That blank stare!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4115.ja:
<voice 02474_00004115><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「なんですか　ポツコン２号ッ？
　その　しらーっとした目は！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4115.ko:
<voice 02474_00004115><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 뭡니까, 터리엉 2호?
　그 냉랭한 눈빛은!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4115.zh-Hans:
<voice 02474_00004115><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>怎么了？波茨康２号？
怎么一脸扫兴的样子？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4115.zh-Hant:
<voice 02474_00004115><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>怎麼了？波茨康２號？
怎麼一臉掃興的樣子？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4116.en:
<voice 02554_00004116><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Hahaa... I get it. Ya're worried 'bout what Poiclin
said, aintcha?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4116.ja:
<voice 02554_00004116><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「ははあ……　なるほど。
　さっきの　ポイックリンの話を
　気にしてるんですねッ？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4116.ko:
<voice 02554_00004116><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 아하…… 알겠습니다.
　방금 져클린이 한 얘기가
　신경 쓰여서 그러는 거군요?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4116.zh-Hans:
<voice 02554_00004116><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>哦……原来如此，
你很在意刚才
珀伊库琳说的话吗？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4116.zh-Hant:
<voice 02554_00004116><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>喔……原來如此，
你很在意剛才
珀伊庫琳說的話嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4117.en: <voice 02808_00004117><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>This tablet's unfortunately a useful thing, but...<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4117.ja:
<voice 02808_00004117><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「この石板は　残念ながら
　使えるものでしたが……。<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4117.ko:
<voice 02808_00004117><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 아쉽게도 이 석판은
　쓸모 있는 물건이었습니다만…….<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4117.zh-Hans:
<voice 02808_00004117><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>很可惜，这块石板
是有用途的东西……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4117.zh-Hant:
<voice 02808_00004117><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>很可惜，這塊石板
是有用途的東西……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4118.en:
<voice 03126_00004118><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>If I use it on the door at the end of Urbea Underground
Ruins, I'm sure there's even more junk lyin' 'round!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4118.ja:
<voice 03126_00004118><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「これを使って　開けられる
　ウルベア地下遺跡の扉の先には　きっと
　さらなるガラクタが　眠っているんですよ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4118.ko:
<voice 03126_00004118><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 이걸로 열 수 있는
　우르베아 지하 유적의 문 너머에는
　분명 더 많은 고물이 잠들어 있을 겁니다!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4118.zh-Hans:
<voice 03126_00004118><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>不过它能打开乌尔贝阿地下遗迹的大门，
在那扇门后面，一定还沉睡着
更多废品！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4118.zh-Hant:
<voice 03126_00004118><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>不過它能打開烏爾貝亞地下遺跡的大門，
在那扇門後面，一定還沉睡著
更多廢品！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4119.en:
<voice 03208_00004119><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>My instincts ain't never been wrong! This li'l Green
Tablet'll definitely lead me ta more junk!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4119.ja:
<voice 03208_00004119><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「わしのカンは　ハズれたことがねえです！
　この緑の石板ちゃんは　必ず　わしを
　ガラクタの元へ　導いてくれますよッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4119.ko:
<voice 03208_00004119><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 제 감은 틀린 적이 없다고요!
　이 사랑스러운 녹색 석판이 우릴 반드시
　고물에게로 데려가 줄 겁니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4119.zh-Hans:
<voice 03208_00004119><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我的直觉向来不会出错！
这块绿色石板一定会
带我找到废品！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4119.zh-Hant:
<voice 03208_00004119><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我的直覺向來不會出錯！
這塊綠石板一定會
帶我找到廢品！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000577.en:
<voice 03380_19000577><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>C'mon Junkies #1 and #2! Let's get back ta Gatara 'n'
prepare right away!! It's a race!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000577.ja:
<voice 03380_19000577><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「さあ　ポツコン１号　２号ッ！
　ガタラに帰って　すぐに準備ですよー！！
　競争ですッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000577.ko:
<voice 03380_19000577><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 자, 터리엉 1호, 2호!
　가타라로 돌아가서 당장 준비합시다~!!
　누가 먼저 도착하는지 경주하죠!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000577.zh-Hans:
<voice 03380_19000577><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>好了，波茨康１号和２号！
我们回加塔拉去，赶紧做准备！
这可是比赛！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000577.zh-Hant:
<voice 03380_19000577><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>好了，波茨康１號、２號！
回加塔拉去，趕緊做準備──！！
這可是比賽！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000578.en: Duston and Junkey #1 have left the party!
19000578.ja:
ダストンと　ポツコン１号が
パーティから　外れた。
19000578.zh-Hans:
达斯顿与波茨康１号
脱离了队伍。
19000578.zh-Hant:
達斯頓與波茨康１號
脫離了隊伍。

4121.ja: <voice 00140_00004121><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「あっ　ポツコン２号さん！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4121.ko: <voice 00140_00004121><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 앗, 터리엉 2호님!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4121.zh-Hans: <voice 00140_00004121><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>啊！波茨康２号！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4121.zh-Hant: <voice 00140_00004121><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>啊！波茨康２號！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4122.en: <voice 00180_00004122><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Huh? Have I seen Chiri? She left not too long ago.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4122.ja:
<voice 00180_00004122><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「あれ？　チリさんに会いませんでした？
　ちょっと前に　ここを出ていったんですけど。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4122.ko:
<voice 00180_00004122><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 어라? 치리 씨, 못 만났어요?
　방금 나갔는데.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4122.zh-Hans:
<voice 00180_00004122><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>咦？你看到琪莉小姐了吗？
她刚刚才从这里离开。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4122.zh-Hant:
<voice 00180_00004122><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>咦？你有看到琪莉小姐嗎？
她剛剛才從這裡離開。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4123.en:
<voice 00210_00004123><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>She was as cute as ever～<heart> It's hard to believe she's
a Dwarf like me!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4123.ja:
<voice 00210_00004123><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「相変わらず　かわいかったな～<heart>
　ボクと同じドワーフとは　思えないくらい！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4123.ko:
<voice 00210_00004123><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 언제 봐도 참 예쁘다니까요~<heart>
　저랑 같은 드워프란 게
　믿기지 않을 정도예요!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4123.zh-Hans:
<voice 00210_00004123><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>她还是那么可爱啊<heart>
完全无法想象她和我一样是多瓦夫！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4123.zh-Hant:
<voice 00210_00004123><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>她還是那麼可愛啊<heart>
完全無法想像她和我一樣是多瓦夫！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4124.en: <voice 00260_00004124><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Err, Chiri is Lord Duston's daughter...<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4124.ja:
<voice 00260_00004124><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ええと　チリさんっていうのは
　ダストンさまの娘なんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4124.ko:
<voice 00260_00004124><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 아, 치리 씨는
　더스턴 님의 딸이에요.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4124.zh-Hans:
<voice 00260_00004124><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>呃，琪莉小姐是
达斯顿大人的女儿。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4124.zh-Hant:
<voice 00260_00004124><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>呃，琪莉小姐是
達斯頓大人的女兒。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4125.en:
<voice 00290_00004125><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>...But they're not related by blood, and they broke
ties after a big fight three years ago.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4125.ja:
<voice 00290_00004125><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「……とは言っても　血はつながっていないし
　３年前の　そーぜつなケンカの末
　親子の縁も　切られているんですけどね。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4125.ko:
<voice 00290_00004125><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: ……딸이라고 해도 친딸은 아닌 데다
　3년 전에 크게 싸운 뒤로는
　부녀가 아예 절연한 상태지만요.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4125.zh-Hans:
<voice 00290_00004125><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>……但其实他们并没有血缘关系，
而且三年前还大吵一架，
彻底断绝父女关系了。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4125.zh-Hant:
<voice 00290_00004125><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>……但其實他們並沒有血緣關係，
而且三年前還大吵一架，
徹底斷絕父女關係了。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4126.en:
<voice 00320_00004126><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>When I told her that Lord Duston had retrieved the
Green Tablet and was on his way back again, she ran
right out...<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4126.ja:
<voice 00320_00004126><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ダストンさまなら　緑の石板を取り戻してきて
　また　すぐに出かけたって教えたら
　チリさん　すぐに飛びだしていっちゃって。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4126.ko:
<voice 00320_00004126><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 더스턴 님이 녹색 석판을 찾아오자마자
　다시 나갔다고 했더니
　치리 씨도 헐레벌떡 뛰어나가더라고요.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4126.zh-Hans:
<voice 00320_00004126><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>琪莉小姐得知达斯顿大人
拿回绿色石板后就马上出门，
于是她也立刻冲出去了。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4126.zh-Hant:
<voice 00320_00004126><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>琪莉小姐得知達斯頓大人拿回綠石板後
就馬上出門，
於是她也立刻衝出去了。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4127.en:
<voice 00350_00004127><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Does she have a boyfriend～? It's a shame, I had so
many questions I wanted to ask her.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4127.ja:
<voice 00350_00004127><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「恋人は　いるの～？　とか
　チリさんに聞きたいこと
　いっぱいあったのに　残念だな。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4127.ko:
<voice 00350_00004127><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 애인 유무라든가
　치리 씨한테 물어보고 싶은 게
　많았는데, 아쉽네요.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4127.zh-Hans:
<voice 00350_00004127><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>真遗憾，我本来还有很多事想问她。
例如有没有男朋友之类的。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4127.zh-Hant:
<voice 00350_00004127><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>真遺憾，我本來還有很多事想問她。
例如有沒有
男朋友之類的。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4129.en: <voice 00430_00004129><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Oh, that's right!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4129.ja: <voice 00430_00004129><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「あっ　そうでした！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4129.ko: <voice 00430_00004129><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 참, 그렇지!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4130.en:
<voice 00460_00004130><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>I was told to deliver a message to you. Lord Duston
said to come to the Urbea Underground Ruins!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4130.ja:
<voice 00460_00004130><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ポツコン２号さんに伝言です。
　ダストンさまが　ウルベア地下遺跡に来いって
　おっしゃっていましたよ！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4130.ko:
<voice 00460_00004130><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 터리엉 2호님에게 전언이 있어요.
　더스턴 님이 우르베아 지하 유적으로
　오라고 하셨어요!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4130.zh-Hans:
<voice 00460_00004130><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>有话要转告给波茨康２号。
达斯顿大人要你马上赶到
乌尔贝阿地下遗迹去！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4130.zh-Hant:
<voice 00460_00004130><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>有話要轉告波茨康２號。
達斯頓大人要你馬上趕到
烏爾貝亞地下遺跡去！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4131.en:
<voice 00490_00004131><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>The Urbea Underground Ruins are the remains of a once
prosperous country northwest of Gatara. Apparently,
it's where Chiri and Duston had their big fight.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4131.ja:
<voice 00490_00004131><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ウルベア地下遺跡は　このガタラの北西にある
　大昔　栄えた国の遺跡で　なんでも
　チリさんが　捨てられてた場所らしいです。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4131.ko:
<voice 00490_00004131><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 우르베아 지하 유적은 가타라 북서쪽에 있는
　먼 옛날에 번성했던 나라의 유적인데
　듣기로는 치리 씨가 버려졌던 곳이라고 해요.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4131.zh-Hans:
<voice 00490_00004131><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>乌尔贝阿地下遗迹在加塔拉的西北边，
过去曾是很繁荣的国家，那边听说是
琪莉小姐被弃养的地方。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4131.zh-Hant:
<voice 00490_00004131><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>烏爾貝亞地下遺跡在加塔拉的西北邊，
過去曾是很繁榮的國家，那邊聽說是
琪莉小姐被棄養的地方。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4132.en: <voice 00530_00004132><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>I can't forgive him for abandoning cute little Chiri!!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4132.ja:
<voice 00530_00004132><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「あんなに　かわいいチリさんを捨てるなんて
　許せませんよ　ボクはっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4132.ko:
<voice 00530_00004132><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 예쁜 치리 씨를 버리다니
　절대 용서 못 해요!!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4132.zh-Hans:
<voice 00530_00004132><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>居然抛弃那么可爱的琪莉小姐，
真是太可恶了！！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4132.zh-Hant:
<voice 00530_00004132><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>居然拋棄那麼可愛的琪莉小姐，
真是太可惡了！！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24737.en:
<voice 00570_00024737><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>...Uhh. So, to repeat, the Urbea Underground Ruins
are located west of town along the mountains.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24737.ja:
<voice 00570_00024737><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「……あ。それで　伝言の続きなんですが
　ウルベア地下遺跡は　町を出て
　西の山沿いに進んだ先に　あるそうです。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24737.ko:
<voice 00570_00024737><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: ……아, 전언을 마저 전하자면
　우르베아 지하 유적은 마을을 나가
　서쪽 산을 따라가면 나온다고 해요.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24737.zh-Hans:
<voice 00570_00024737><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>……啊，要转告的话还没说完。
要到乌尔贝阿地下遗迹的话，
出了城镇以后沿着西边的山一直走。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24737.zh-Hant:
<voice 00570_00024737><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>……啊，要轉告的還沒說完。
要到烏爾貝亞地下遺跡的話，
出了市鎮以後沿著西邊的山一直走。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24738.en:
<voice 00600_00024738><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Unfortunately, the entrance is a little hard to find,
so you'll have to put in a little elbow grease. Now
then, please help Lord Duston!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24738.ja:
<voice 00600_00024738><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ただ　入り口が少し　わかりづらいようなので

　それでは　ダストンさまを頼みましたよ！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24738.ko:
<voice 00600_00024738><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 다만 입구가 좀 찾기 어려운 모양이니

　그럼 더스턴 님을 잘 부탁드립니다!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24738.zh-Hans:
<voice 00600_00024738><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>只是那里的入口有点难找，
需要有毅力并付出努力。
那么，达斯顿大人就拜托你了！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24738.zh-Hant:
<voice 00600_00024738><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>只是那裡的入口有點難找，
最後就要靠你的努力與毅力了。
那麼，達斯頓大人就拜託你囉！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00190_00004137><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>You understand, right? The Urbea Underground Ruins,

4139.en:
<voice 00120_00004139><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>That Green Tablet... I know I threw it away, so why
does he have it?<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4139.ja:
<voice 00120_00004139><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「あの緑の石板……　間違いなく捨てたのに

<voice 00120_00004139><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 그 녹색 석판…… 분명히 버렸는데

4139.zh-Hans:
<voice 00120_00004139><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>那块绿色石板……我明明就丢掉了，

4139.zh-Hant:
<voice 00120_00004139><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>那塊綠石板……我明明就丟掉了，

4140.en: <voice 00230_00004140><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>...Aah!! You're <pc>, right!?<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4140.ja:
<voice 00230_00004140><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「……あっ！！

<voice 00230_00004140><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>……啊！！

<voice 00230_00004140><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>……啊！！

4141.en: <voice 00340_00004141><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>The eyes of justice shine brightest in darkness!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4141.ja: <voice 00340_00004141><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「天知る！　地知る！　人ぞ知る！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4141.ko: <voice 00340_00004141><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 하늘이 알고! 땅이 알고! 사람이 아는!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4141.zh-Hans: <voice 00340_00004141><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>天知，地知，你知我知！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4141.zh-Hant: <voice 00340_00004141><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>天知，地知，你知我知！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4142.en:
<voice 00461_00004142><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>The beautiful lady thief, Poiclin! Arriving in all
her splendor!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4142.ja:
<voice 00461_00004142><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「美少女怪盗ポイックリン！
　華麗に　参上でございますわっ！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4142.ko:
<voice 00461_00004142><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 미소녀 괴도 져클린!
　화려하게 등장!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4142.zh-Hans:
<voice 00461_00004142><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>美少女怪盗珀伊库琳！
华丽登场！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4142.zh-Hant:
<voice 00461_00004142><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>美少女怪盜珀伊庫琳！
華麗登場！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4143.en: <voice 00541_00004143><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>Gah, this isn't the time for that!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4143.ja:
<voice 00541_00004143><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「ああっ　こんなこと
　してる場合じゃないのにっ！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4143.ko:
<voice 00541_00004143><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 으앗, 이런 걸
　하고 있을 때가 아닌데!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4143.zh-Hans:
<voice 00541_00004143><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>啊啊！现在
没空管这种事了！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4143.zh-Hant:
<voice 00541_00004143><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>啊啊！現在
沒空管這種事情了！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4144.en:
<voice 00601_00004144><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>Please, <pc>! You have to help me! If you
don't, he's going to make a terrible mistake!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4144.ja:
<voice 00601_00004144><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「お願い　<pc>！　私に協力して！
　このままだと　あの人は
　とんでもない過ちを犯してしまう！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4144.ko:
<voice 00601_00004144><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 부탁이야, <pc>! 날 도와줘!
　이대로 놔뒀다간 그 사람이
　끔찍한 잘못을 저지르고 말 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4144.zh-Hans:
<voice 00601_00004144><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>拜托你，<pc>！帮帮我！
再这样下去，
他会犯下无法挽回的大错！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4144.zh-Hant:
<voice 00601_00004144><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>拜託你，<pc>！幫幫我！
再這樣下去，
那個人會犯下無法挽回的大錯！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4145.en:
<voice 00631_00004145><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>The truth is, deep underground in these ruins, there's
a door that can only be opened by the Green Tablet...
And behind it lies a mysterious ancient weapon!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4145.ja:
<voice 00631_00004145><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「じつはね　この遺跡の地下深くには
　緑の石板でしか　開けられない扉があって……
　その中には　謎の古代兵器が眠っているの！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4145.ko:
<voice 00631_00004145><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 사실 이 유적 지하 깊은 곳에는
　녹색 석판으로만 열 수 있는 문이 있는데……
　그 안에 수수께끼의 고대 병기가 잠들어 있어!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4145.zh-Hans:
<voice 00631_00004145><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>其实在这座地下遗迹的深处，
有一道只能用绿色石板打开的门……
门后有神秘的古代兵器！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4145.zh-Hant:
<voice 00631_00004145><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>其實在這座地下遺跡的深處，
有一道只能用綠石板打開的門……
門後有神祕的古代兵器！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24745.en:
<voice 00661_00024745><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>We have to get the Green Tablet back before he wakes
up the ancient weapon...!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24745.ja:
<voice 00661_00024745><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「あの人が　古代兵器を目覚めさせてしまう前に
　緑の石板を　奪い返さないと……！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24745.ko:
<voice 00661_00024745><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 그 사람이 고대 병기를 깨우기 전에
　녹색 석판을 빼앗아야 해……!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24745.zh-Hans:
<voice 00661_00024745><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>必须在那个人唤醒古代兵器之前，
把绿色石板抢回来……！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24745.zh-Hant:
<voice 00661_00024745><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>必須在那個人喚醒古代兵器之前，
把綠石板搶回來……！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24746.en:
<voice 00701_00024746><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>Let's hurry, <pc>! He went around that
corner over there! If we head underground there, we
can catch up with him!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24746.ja:
<voice 00701_00024746><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「急ぎましょう　<pc>！
　あの人は　この先を　右に曲がっていったわ！
　そこから地下を目指せば　追いつけるはずよ！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24746.ko:
<voice 00701_00024746><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 서두르자, <pc>!
　그 사람은 여기서 오른쪽으로 갔어!

4191.zh-Hans: <voice 01030_00004191><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>是、是啊！因为……<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4191.zh-Hant: <voice 01030_00004191><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>是、是啊！因為……<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4192.en: <voice 01113_00004192><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Urrrgh～! I value this junk way more than my own life!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4192.ja:
<voice 01113_00004192><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「く～～～っ！
　わしは　自分の命なんかよりも
　ガラクタの方が　ずーっと大事なんですッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4192.ko:
<voice 01113_00004192><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 크윽~~~!
　전 제 목숨보다
　고물이 훨씬 더 소중하다고요!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4192.zh-Hans:
<voice 01113_00004192><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>唔～～～～！
比起我自己的命，
废品重要多了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4192.zh-Hant:
<voice 01113_00004192><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>唔～～～～！
比起我自己的命，
廢品重要多了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4193.en:
<voice 01193_00004193><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Please don't go getting me involved with yer
mushy-gushy ideals about the value of life!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4193.ja:
<voice 01193_00004193><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「命のが大事だなんて　甘っちょろい価値観に
　わしを　はめ込まないでくださいッ！
　余計なコトしねえでくだせいッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4193.ko:
<voice 01193_00004193><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 목숨이 더 소중하다는 같잖은 가치관으로
　맘대로 절 판단하지 마십쇼!
　쓸데없는 짓 하지 말란 말입니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4193.zh-Hans:
<voice 01193_00004193><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>别用珍惜生命这种天真的
价值观来衡量我！
不要再管闲事！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4193.zh-Hant:
<voice 01193_00004193><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>別用珍惜生命這種天真的
價值觀來衡量我！
不需要妳雞婆！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4196.ja: <voice 01471_00004196><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「あははははははは！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4196.zh-Hans: <voice 01471_00004196><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4196.zh-Hant: <voice 01471_00004196><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4197.en:
<voice 01554_00004197><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>That piece of junk is more important than your life!
Ahaha, sorry! It's just, I didn't realize you were
THAT bad!<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4197.ja:
<voice 01554_00004197><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「ガラクタが　命よりも大事なんだ！
　あはは　ごめんっ！
　そこまでとは思わなかった！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4197.ko:
<voice 01554_00004197><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 목숨보다 고물이 더 소중하구나!
　아하하, 미안!
　그 정도일 줄은 몰랐어!<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4197.zh-Hans:
<voice 01554_00004197><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>废品比生命重要！
啊哈哈，抱歉！
我还真不知道你有这么夸张！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4197.zh-Hant:
<voice 01554_00004197><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>廢品比生命重要！
啊哈哈，抱歉！
我還真不知道你有這麼誇張！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4198.en:
<voice 01656_00004198><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Honestly! How did I live with you for so long?
You're surprisingly more useless than I thought!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4198.ja:
<voice 01656_00004198><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「まったく！　何年　わしと暮らしてたんです？
　アンタも意外と　半人前ですねえ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4198.ko:
<voice 01656_00004198><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 나 참!
　저랑 몇 년을 살았는데 모르는 겁니까?
　치리도 보기보다 맹한 구석이 있네요!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4198.zh-Hans:
<voice 01656_00004198><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>真是的！你跟我一起住多久了？
没想到这么不懂事！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4198.zh-Hant:
<voice 01656_00004198><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>真是的！妳跟我一起住多久了？
沒想到這麼不懂事！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4199.en:
<voice 01896_00004199><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>Hey, dad. Since <cs_pchero> turned that Urbea Aztech
into junk...<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4199.ja:
<voice 01896_00004199><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「ねえ　お父さん。
　ウルベア魔神兵を　ガラクタにしてくれた
　<cs_pchero>に……<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4199.ko:
<voice 01896_00004199><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 있잖아, 아빠.
　우르베아 마신병을 고물로 만들어 준
　<cs_pchero>에게……<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4199.zh-Hans:
<voice 01896_00004199><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>爸爸，
<cs_pchero>帮我们把乌尔贝阿魔神兵
变成废品了……<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4199.zh-Hant:
<voice 01896_00004199><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>爸爸，
<cs_pchero>幫我們把烏爾貝亞魔神兵
變成廢品了……<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4200.en: <voice 01976_00004200><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>Dad, why don't you give them your Key Emblem as thanks?<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4200.ja:
<voice 01976_00004200><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「お礼に　お父さんの持っている
　キーエンブレムを　あげたらどうかな？<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4200.ko:
<voice 01976_00004200><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 답례로 아빠가 가진
　키 엠블럼을 주는 게 어때?<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4200.zh-Hans:
<voice 01976_00004200><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>你就把身上的键徽
给人家当作谢礼嘛。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4200.zh-Hant:
<voice 01976_00004200><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>你就把身上的鑰徽
給人家當作謝禮嘛。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4201.ja: <voice 02071_00004201><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「なんですって！？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4201.zh-Hans: <voice 02071_00004201><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你说什么？！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4201.zh-Hant: <voice 02071_00004201><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>妳說什麼！？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4202.en:
<voice 02135_00004202><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>That piece of junk is worth more than my life! There
aren't many things that are as useless as that is...<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4202.ja:
<voice 02135_00004202><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「あれは　わしの命より大切なガラクタですよ！
　あれほど　意味のないシロモノなんて
　そうそう……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4202.ko:
<voice 02135_00004202><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 그건 제 목숨보다 소중한 고물이라고요!
　그렇게 가치 없는 물건은
　쉽사리……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4202.zh-Hans:
<voice 02135_00004202><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>那是比我生命还要重要的废品！
那么没用的东西
可是很罕见的……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4202.zh-Hant:
<voice 02135_00004202><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>那是比我生命還要重要的廢品！
那麼沒用的東西
可是很罕見的……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4203.en:
<voice 02211_00004203><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>You may not know this, dad, but right now, people all
over the world are looking for Key Emblems to make
a name for themselves.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4203.ja:
<voice 02211_00004203><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「お父さんは知らないだろうけど
　今は　世界中の人たちが　名を上げるために
　キーエンブレムを求めているのよ。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4203.ko:
<voice 02211_00004203><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 아빠는 잘 모르겠지만
　지금 전 세계 사람들이 명성을 쌓기 위해
　키 엠블럼을 얻으러 다니고 있다고.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4203.zh-Hans:
<voice 02211_00004203><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>我想你应该还不知道，
现在全世界的人为了扬名立万，
都在拼命寻找键徽呢。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4203.zh-Hant:
<voice 02211_00004203><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>我想你應該還不知道，
現在全世界的人為了揚名立萬，
都在拚命尋找鑰徽呢。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4204.en: <voice 02301_00004204><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>I bet <cs_pchero> is one of them.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4204.ja:
<voice 02301_00004204><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「きっと　<cs_pchero>も
　そのひとりだと思うわ。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4204.ko:
<voice 02301_00004204><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 아마 <cs_pchero>도
　그런 사람 중 한 명일 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4204.zh-Hans:
<voice 02301_00004204><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>应该
也是其中之一。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4204.zh-Hant:
<voice 02301_00004204><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>應該
也是其中之一。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4205.en:
<voice 02366_00004205><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>These days, those with a Key Emblem are recognized as
highly skilled; even kings and sages will rely on them!<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4205.ja:
<voice 02366_00004205><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「キーエンブレムを持っていると
　ウデききと認められ　王様や賢者様から
　頼りにされる時代なのよ。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4205.ko:
<voice 02366_00004205><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 키 엠블럼을 갖고 있으면
　실력을 인정받아 임금님이나 현자님이
　도움을 청하는 시대라고.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4205.zh-Hans:
<voice 02366_00004205><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>现在这个时代，
键徽可以说是能力的象征，
能获得国王和贤者的垂青。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4205.zh-Hant:
<voice 02366_00004205><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>現在這個時代，
鑰徽可以說是能力的象徵，
能獲得國王和賢者的垂青。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4206.ja: <voice 02481_00004206><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「た　頼りにされる……！？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4206.ko: <voice 02481_00004206><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 도, 도움을 청해요……!?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4206.zh-Hans: <voice 02481_00004206><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>获、获得垂青……？！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4206.zh-Hant: <voice 02481_00004206><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>獲、獲得垂青……！？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4207.en:
<voice 02551_00004207><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Whoooa, please quit it! I don't want to be put in an
embarrassing position like that!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4207.ja:
<voice 02551_00004207><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「うおおお　やめてくだせえッ！
　そんな恥ずかしい目には　あいたくねえです！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4207.ko:
<voice 02551_00004207><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 으아아악, 그만하십쇼!
　그런 창피한 꼴은 절대 겪고 싶지 않습니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4207.zh-Hans:
<voice 02551_00004207><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>唔哦哦哦，不要啊！！
我可不想那么丢人现眼！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4207.zh-Hant:
<voice 02551_00004207><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>唔喔喔喔，不要啊！！
我可不想那麼丟人現眼！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4208.en: <voice 02643_00004208><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Understood! The Key Emblem's yers, <cs_pchero>!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4208.ja:
<voice 02643_00004208><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「わかりましたよッ！　キーエンブレムは
　<cs_pchero>に　ゆずるですよッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4208.ko:
<voice 02643_00004208><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 알겠습니다! 키 엠블럼은
　<cs_pchero>에게 주겠습니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4208.zh-Hans:
<voice 02643_00004208><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我知道了！我把键徽
让给<cs_pchero>就是了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4208.zh-Hant:
<voice 02643_00004208><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我知道了！我把鑰徽
讓給<cs_pchero>就是了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4209.ja: <voice 02717_00004209><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「まったく！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4209.ko: <voice 02717_00004209><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 나 원!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4210.en:
<voice 02796_00004210><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Ya always find value in my precious junk, calling it
the 'discovery of the century' and ruining its
uselessness...<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4210.ja:
<voice 02796_00004210><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「いつも　わしの大切なガラクタに
　世紀の大発見だ　なんだのと　価値を見出して
　役立たずさを　台無しにする……。<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4210.ko:
<voice 02796_00004210><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 매번 제 소중한 고물을 보면
　세기의 대발견이니 뭐니 하면서
　가치를 찾아 유용한 물건으로 만드니…….<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4210.zh-Hans:
<voice 02796_00004210><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>总是从我宝贵的废品中
找出不得了的价值，
让它们变得不再没用……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4210.zh-Hant:
<voice 02796_00004210><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>總是從我寶貴的廢品中
找出不得了的價值，
讓它們變得不再沒用……<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4211.en: <voice 02906_00004211><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Ya really are a traitor of a daughter!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4211.ja: <voice 02906_00004211><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「アンタは　本当に　親不孝な娘ですよッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4211.ko: <voice 02906_00004211><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 당신은 정말 불효 막심한 딸입니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4211.zh-Hans: <voice 02906_00004211><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你真是个不孝的女儿！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4211.zh-Hant: <voice 02906_00004211><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>妳真是個不孝的女兒！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4213.ja: <voice 03031_00004213><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「……ありがとう　お父さん。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4213.zh-Hans: <voice 03031_00004213><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>……谢谢你，爸爸。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4213.zh-Hant: <voice 03031_00004213><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>……謝謝你，爸爸。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4216.en: <voice 03221_00004216><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>Come on, hurry up and get out of here!<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4216.ja: <voice 03221_00004216><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「さあ　急いで　ここから出て！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4216.ko: <voice 03221_00004216><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 자, 빨리 여기서 나가자!<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4216.zh-Hans: <voice 03221_00004216><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>好了，我们快点离开这里吧！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4216.zh-Hant: <voice 03221_00004216><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>好了，我們快點離開這裡吧！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4217.en:
<voice 03271_00004217><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>The Royal Academy of Research in Dolworm Kingdom
doesn't fully understand this room yet.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4217.ja:
<voice 03271_00004217><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「この部屋のことは　まだ
　ドルワーム王国にある　王立研究院でも
　ちゃんと解明できていないの。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4217.ko:
<voice 03271_00004217><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 이 방의 비밀은
　도르웜 왕국에 있는 왕립 연구원에서도
　아직 규명하지 못했거든.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4217.zh-Hans:
<voice 03271_00004217><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>就连多尔瓦姆王国王立研究院
都还没弄清楚这个房间的谜团。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4217.zh-Hant:
<voice 03271_00004217><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>就連多爾瓦姆王國王立研究院
都還沒弄清楚這個房間的謎團。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4218.en: <voice 03331_00004218><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>I'll take the Green Tablet in case anything goes wrong!<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4218.ja:
<voice 03331_00004218><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「何かあるといけないから
　緑の石板は　私が　あずかるわね！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4218.ko:
<voice 03331_00004218><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 또 무슨 일이 생기면 안 되니까
　녹색 석판은 내가 보관할게!<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4218.zh-Hans:
<voice 03331_00004218><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>为了避免再出事，
绿色石板先由我保管了！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4218.zh-Hant:
<voice 03331_00004218><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>為了避免再出事情，
綠石板先由我保管了！<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4220.en:
<voice 03896_00004220><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, if it wasn't for you, I don't know
what I would have done... I really appreciate it.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4220.ja:
<voice 03896_00004220><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>が　いなかったら
　どうなっていたことか……。
　本当に　ありがとう。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4220.ko:
<voice 03896_00004220><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 네가 없었으면
　어떻게 됐을지…….
　정말 고마워.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4220.zh-Hans:
<voice 03896_00004220><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>要是没有<cs_pchero>，
真不知道会变成什么样子……
真的很谢谢你。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4220.zh-Hant:
<voice 03896_00004220><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>要是沒有<cs_pchero>，
真不知道會變成什麼樣子……
真的很謝謝你。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000586.en:
<voice 03897_19000586><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>As you can see, my father values junk far more than
life itself. Really, I guess he can't help it anymore,
can he.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000586.ja:
<voice 03897_19000586><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「聞いてのとおり　お父さんは
　命より　ガラクタが大事な人なの。
　まったく　もう　どーしよーもないわね。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000586.ko:
<voice 03897_19000586><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 들었겠지만 아버지는
　목숨보다 고물이 소중한 사람이야.
　정말 못 말린다니까.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000586.zh-Hans:
<voice 03897_19000586><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>如你所听到的，
比起性命，爸爸更重视废品。
真的是拿他没办法呢。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000586.zh-Hant:
<voice 03897_19000586><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>如你所聽到的，
比起性命，爸爸更重視廢品。
真的是拿他沒辦法呢。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000587.en:
<voice 03898_19000587><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>I'm sorry for the trouble he caused. If he's ever in
trouble again I hope you'll be here to help.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000587.ja:
<voice 03898_19000587><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「ゴメンだけど　また　お父さんが
　危ない目にあったら　助けるのを
　手伝ってくれると　うれしいな。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000587.ko:
<voice 03898_19000587><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 미안하지만 아버지에게 또다시
　위험한 일이 닥쳤을 때
　함께 구해 주면 고맙겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000587.zh-Hans:
<voice 03898_19000587><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>虽然不太好意思，
但要是爸爸又遇上危险，
希望你能协助我救他。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000587.zh-Hant:
<voice 03898_19000587><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>雖然不太好意思，
但要是爸爸又遇上危險，
希望你能協助我救他。<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001426.en:
<voice 03996_19001426><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>Oh yeah and when you get back to Junk Castle, don't
forget to get the Key Emblem before my dad inevitably
forgets about it!<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001426.ja:
<voice 03996_19001426><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>「あ　そうそう　ガラクタ城に着いたら
　お父さんが　キーエンブレムのことを
　忘れてしまう前に　必ず　もらうのよ？<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001426.ko:
<voice 03996_19001426><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>: 참, 고물성에 가면
　아빠가 키 엠블럼을 깜빡하기 전에
　꼭 받도록 해.<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001426.zh-Hans:
<voice 03996_19001426><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>啊，对了，等到了废品城，
记得一定要在爸爸
忘了键徽的事前跟他要哦？<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001426.zh-Hant:
<voice 03996_19001426><start_lip_sync n00537 _normal m00001>啊，對了，等到了廢品城，
記得一定要在爸爸
忘了鑰徽的事前跟他要喔？<stop_lip_animation n00537 CLOSE_MOUTH>

6759.en:
<voice 04115_00006759><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>I'm going back to the Junk Castle! I can't carry this
much junk with me, so I'll have to head back with
Junkey.<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6759.ja:
<voice 04115_00006759><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「わしは　一度　ガラクタ城へ戻りますッ！
　あんな大量のガラクタ　持ちきれないんで
　ポツコンを連れて　出直すことにしますよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6759.ko:
<voice 04115_00006759><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 난 일단 고물성으로 돌아가겠습니다!
　저렇게 많은 고물은 한 번에 옮길 수 없으니
　터리엉을 데리고 다시 오려고요!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6759.zh-Hans:
<voice 04115_00006759><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我要先回一趟废品城！
这么多的废品拿不了。
等我带上波茨康后还要再来！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6759.zh-Hant:
<voice 04115_00006759><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我要先回廢品城一趟！
這麼多破銅爛鐵我一個人拿不完，
我要回去帶波茨康過來！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4223.en: <voice 04416_00004223><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>Now then, I bid you all adieu!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4223.ja: <voice 04416_00004223><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「それでは皆さん　ごきげんよう。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4223.ko: <voice 04416_00004223><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 그럼 다들 잘 있어.<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4223.zh-Hans: <voice 04416_00004223><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>那么，大家保重了。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4223.zh-Hant: <voice 04416_00004223><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>那麼，大家保重了。<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

6760.en: <voice 04456_00006760><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>And thus, I vanish without a trace!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6760.ja:
<voice 04456_00006760><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>「チリも残さず
　キレイに退散ですわっ！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6760.ko:
<voice 04456_00006760><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>: 먼지 한 톨 없이
　깔끔하게 해산!<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6760.zh-Hans: <voice 04456_00006760><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>不留痕迹奇丽地撤退了！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6760.zh-Hant:
<voice 04456_00006760><start_lip_sync n00377 _normal m00001>不留痕跡，
華麗地撤退！<stop_lip_animation n00377 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000588.ja:
ポイックリンが
パーティから　外れた。
19000588.zh-Hans:
珀伊库琳
脱离了队伍。
19000588.zh-Hant:
珀伊庫琳
脫離了隊伍。

4224.ja: <voice 00075_00004224><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「あっ　ポツコン２号さんっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4224.ko: <voice 00075_00004224><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 앗, 터리엉 2호님!!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4224.zh-Hans: <voice 00075_00004224><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>啊！波茨康２号！！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4224.zh-Hant: <voice 00075_00004224><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>啊！波茨康２號！！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4225.en: <voice 00104_00004225><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Oh, thanks for comin', Junkey #2!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4225.ja: <voice 00104_00004225><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「おおっ　よく来てくれましたね　ポツコン２号！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4225.ko: <voice 00104_00004225><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 오오, 잘 왔습니다! 터리엉 2호!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4225.zh-Hans: <voice 00104_00004225><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>哦！欢迎你，波茨康２号！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4225.zh-Hant: <voice 00104_00004225><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>喔！歡迎你，波茨康２號！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4226.en: <voice 00159_00004226><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>What do you want?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4226.ja: <voice 00159_00004226><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「いったい　なんの用ですか？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4226.ko: <voice 00159_00004226><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 무슨 용건으로 온 겁니까?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4226.zh-Hans: <voice 00159_00004226><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你有什么事吗？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4226.zh-Hant: <voice 00159_00004226><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你有什麼事嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4228.en: <voice 00249_00004228><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Lord Duston, maybe Junkey #2 came to pick up the Key Emblem.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4228.ja:
<voice 00249_00004228><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ダストンさま。
　もしかして　ポツコン２号さんは
　キーエンブレムを　取りにいらしたのでは？<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4228.ko:
<voice 00249_00004228><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 더스턴 님.
　터리엉 2호님은 키 엠블럼을
　받으러 오신 거 아닐까요?<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4228.zh-Hans:
<voice 00249_00004228><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>达斯顿大人，
波茨康２号也许
是来拿键徽的。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4228.zh-Hant:
<voice 00249_00004228><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>達斯頓大人，
波茨康２號也許
是來拿鑰徽的。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4229.en: <voice 00269_00004229><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>The Key Emblem!?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4229.ja: <voice 00269_00004229><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「キーエンブレムっ！？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4229.ko: <voice 00269_00004229><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 키 엠블럼!?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4230.ja: <voice 00321_00004230><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「……って　なんですか？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4230.zh-Hans: <voice 00321_00004230><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>……那是什么东西？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4230.zh-Hant: <voice 00321_00004230><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>……那是什麼東西？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4231.ja: <voice 00344_00004231><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ダ…ダストンさま……。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4231.ko: <voice 00344_00004231><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 더… 더스턴 님…….<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4231.zh-Hans: <voice 00344_00004231><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>达……达斯顿大人……<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4231.zh-Hant: <voice 00344_00004231><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>達……達斯頓大人……<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4232.en:
<voice 00350_00004232><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>You know, that key-shaped medal that you used to
cherish. You said you'd give it to Junkey #2...<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4232.ja:
<voice 00350_00004232><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ほら　以前　大事にしていらっしゃった
　カギの形をした勲章ですよ。
　ポツコン２号さんに　ゆずるって……<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4232.ko:
<voice 00350_00004232><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 왜, 그동안 고이 아끼시던
　열쇠 모양 훈장 있잖아요.
　터리엉 2호님에게 드리겠다고……<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4232.zh-Hans:
<voice 00350_00004232><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>就是您以前非常宝贝的
那个钥匙型勋章啊。
您说要送给波茨康２号……<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4232.zh-Hant:
<voice 00350_00004232><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>就是您以前非常寶貝的
那個鑰匙型勳章啊。
您說要送給波茨康２號……<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4233.en: <voice 00366_00004233><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Mmm...? I don't know what you're talking about.<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4233.ja:
<voice 00366_00004233><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「むむむ……？
　なんのことだか　サーッパリですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4233.ko:
<voice 00366_00004233><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 으음……?
　무슨 소린지 전혀 모르겠군요.<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4233.zh-Hans:
<voice 00366_00004233><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>唔唔……？
我怎么不记得有这回事？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4233.zh-Hant:
<voice 00366_00004233><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>唔唔……？
我怎麼不記得有這回事？<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4234.en: <voice 00371_00004234><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>If you know what it is, Junkey, then go find it!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4234.ja:
<voice 00371_00004234><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「知っているなら
　ポツコンが探してあげるですよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4234.ko:
<voice 00371_00004234><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 뭔지 알면
　터리엉이 찾아다 주십쇼!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4234.zh-Hans:
<voice 00371_00004234><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你要是知道，
就去帮他找出来吧！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4234.zh-Hant:
<voice 00371_00004234><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你要是知道，
就去幫他找出來吧！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4235.en: <voice 00386_00004235><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Yes, Lord Duston!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4235.ja: <voice 00386_00004235><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「はいっ　ダストンさま！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4235.ko: <voice 00386_00004235><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 네, 더스턴 님!<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4235.zh-Hans: <voice 00386_00004235><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>好的，达斯顿大人！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4235.zh-Hant: <voice 00386_00004235><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>是的，達斯頓大人！<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4236.en: <voice 00408_00004236><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>Lord Duston forgets everything that's not junk.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4236.ja:
<voice 00408_00004236><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「ダストンさまは　ガラクタじゃない物のことは
　すぐ忘れてしまうんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4236.ko:
<voice 00408_00004236><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 더스턴 님은 고물에 관한 일이 아니면
　금방 잊어 버리시거든요.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4236.zh-Hans:
<voice 00408_00004236><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>废品以外的东西，
达斯顿大人一下子就会忘掉。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4236.zh-Hant:
<voice 00408_00004236><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>廢品以外的東西，
達斯頓大人一下子就會忘掉。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4237.en:
<voice 00418_00004237><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>But this time you forgot way too soon. After all, you
remembered Chiri for a really long time.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4237.ja:
<voice 00418_00004237><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>「でも　今回は　忘れるの早かったな。
　チリさんのことは　なんだかんだ言って
　ずーっと覚えていらっしゃるのに。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4237.ko:
<voice 00418_00004237><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 그런데 이번엔 유독 금방 잊으셨네.
　치리 씨에 관한 건 이러니저러니 해도
　계속 기억하시면서.<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4237.zh-Hans:
<voice 00418_00004237><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>不过这次也忘得太快了。
琪莉小姐的事情，
他倒是一直记得清清楚楚的。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4237.zh-Hant:
<voice 00418_00004237><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>不過這次也忘得太快了。
琪莉小姐的事情，
他倒是一直記得清清楚楚的。<stop_lip_animation n00381 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00978_19000592><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>How the heck did Lord Duston get his hands on something

<voice 00978_19000592><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>: 더스턴 님 같은 분이

19000592.zh-Hans:
<voice 00978_19000592><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>达斯顿大人，您这等身份的人，

<voice 00978_19000592><start_lip_sync n00381 _normal m00001>達斯頓大人，您這等身分的人，

19000593.en:
<voice 00979_19000593><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>I was holding onto it to someday travel the world in
search for junk, I was putting it off outta fear, but...
Now that time has come!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00979_19000593><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「いつか　ガラクタ探しの旅に出るために

19000593.ko:
<voice 00979_19000593><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 언젠가 고물을 찾는 여행을 떠나려고

　이제 때가 된 거죠!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000593.zh-Hans:
<voice 00979_19000593><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>本来是为了以后踏上寻找废品之旅，
才会忍受着害怕的心情保留到现在……
现在正是它派上用途的时候啊！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000593.zh-Hant:
<voice 00979_19000593><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>本來是為了以後踏上尋找廢品之旅，
才會忍受著害怕的心情保留到現在……
現在正是它派上用途的時候啊！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000594.en:
<voice 01114_19000594><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Junkie #2! Ya're a useful person, and that's why ya

19000594.zh-Hans:
<voice 01114_19000594><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>波茨康２号！
事实证明你是个相当有用的人，
所以不能再当我的助手了。<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000594.zh-Hant:
<voice 01114_19000594><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>波茨康２號！

<voice 01124_19000595><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>But, y'know, there's a smell about ya... The smell of

有股味道？

19000595.zh-Hant:
<voice 01124_19000595><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>不過，你身邊好像

19000596.en:
<voice 01125_19000596><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>...Ya got somethin' to say? There's no point playin'

19000596.zh-Hans:

<voice 01125_19000596><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你應該是有什麼吧？

19000597.zh-Hans:
<voice 01126_19000597><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>就只会对着脑内说话，

19000597.zh-Hant:
<voice 01126_19000597><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>就只會對著腦說話，

<voice 01127_19000598><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>I've made up my mind!! I'm coming with ya! Ya've got

19000598.ko:
<voice 01127_19000598><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 결심했어요!!

<voice 01127_19000598><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我决定了！！

19000598.zh-Hant:
<voice 01127_19000598><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我決定了！！
我要跟著你走！

19000599.zh-Hans:
<voice 01128_19000599><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>那个对我脑内说话的废物

19000600.en: <voice 01129_19000600><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Junkey #1! I leave ya to it while I'm gone!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01129_19000600><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「ポツコン１号！

19000600.zh-Hant:
<voice 01129_19000600><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>波茨康１號！

19000601.ja: ダストンが　仲間になった！<me 2401>
